alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:59PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph causing areas of blowing snow. Additional snow of 1 to 3 inches is expected, with greatest additional snowfall around South Pass. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains, including South Pass. * WHEN...Now until 11 PM today. The best chance of steadier snow will be late this afternoon into the evening. * IMPACTS...Travel over South Pass could become difficult. The combination of snow and blowing snow could result in visibility down to a tenth of mile at times. Also wind chills between 20 below and 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
